summary: The tale of two socially-awkward misfits and the strange ways they try to find love: through revenge on high-school bullies, burgers, and video games.
cast: Loren Taylor|Jemaine Clement|Joel Tobeck|Brian Sergent|Craig Hall|Rachel House|Morag Hills|Bernard Stewart|Taika Waititi|David Fane|Cohen Holloway|Gentiane Lupi|Chelsie Preston Crayford|Adam Gardiner|Jackie van Beek|Miranda Manasiadis|Ban Abdul|Mike King|Madeleine Sami|Anna Horsley|Dylan Taylor|Cori Gonzalez-Macuer|Aaron Cortesi|Kura Sanderson|Riley Brophy|Rosie Graham|Justin Wu|Monique Bradley|Lukasz Pawel Buda|Rachel Forman|Matt Whelan|Tyrell Samia|Tammy Davis|Julian Arahanga|Tanea Heke|Dylan Coburn|Will Hall|Daniel Rathbon|Michael Whalley
title: Eagle vs Shark
